title: Developing More Strong Teachers - Episode 72
itunes:title: Developing More Strong Teachers - Episode 72
description:
Almost never. We almost never see a multisite church succeed with live-teaching at each campus. So naturally, we wanted to get to the bottom of why it works so well at Community Christian Church in the Chicago area. 

In this episode, Tony Morgan interviews Tammy Melchein about how they've become a church that continually develops and resources new, excellent teachers—which makes this model work.

Not leading a multisite church? Don't skip this episode. The creative systems and strategies CCC has implemented to keep raising up new leaders to teach the Gospel will give you plenty to consider even within your single site.

For links mentioned during the episode, visit this episode's show notes at theunstuckgroup.com/episode72.

____

Check out our new online course—Multisite Unstuck, or learn how we help churches get unstuck at theunstuckgroup.com.
